title: Chapter 187
body:
Chapter 187

Chapter 187


In the huge and quiet studio, there was the sound of an artificial stream flowing slowly. The water was clean and clear, passing through most of the studio before finally falling into a small artificial fountain.


Once Ding Bo left, Xi Ze bowed his head and looked at the youth hiding under his desk, refusing to come out. This posture was extremely embarrassing. The space under the table wasn’t small. It was difficult to accommodate a 188cm tall teenage, causing Ming Yu’s upper half to be almost lying on Xi Ze’s legs.


The youth’s warm breath blew through the thin cloth to Xi Ze’s sensitive area, making his already excited area stir even further.


“The man is gone, come out.” Xi Ze tried to suppress his feelings in his voice as he said in a dumb voice. “Underneath the table is too small. I will pull you up. Just now you seem to have hit the table. Does your head hurt?”


As he spoke, Xi Ze stretched out a hand and pulled Ming Yu out from the table. His movements were so ingenious that with a simple tug, Ming Yu was once again straddling Xi Ze’s lap.


Ming Yu’s erotic desires hadn’t completely disappeared. In particular, he was squeezed into such a small space and facing the man’s lower body. Ming Yu was already flushed and the blood in his body was surging excitedly.


After seeing that Xi Ze was holding his waist and leaning over to kiss him, Ming Xiaoyu pushed him away and coughed twice. “The words Ding Bo just said, what did he mean? What magazines? 1,000 copies?”


The man’s dark pupils shrank slightly. It was just a moment as Xi Ze calmed down and returned to normal. “The recent Ji and Ya has a magazine project with Muse. Ding Bo was in charge of this matter. I’m not sure about the 1,000 copies but perhaps he is sending them to the staff of Ji and Ya?”


Xi Ze’s voice was peaceful when he said this and there were no slight ups and downs. It was as if he was telling a big truth, a truth that couldn’t be questioned. But in this sentence, Xi Ze threw all the blame to Ding Bo and a question to Ming Xiaoyu.


Ming Yu squinted suspiciously at the words and tentatively asked, “Is it? Why do I feel like something is wrong?”


Xi Ze just raised an eyebrow and asked, “Is there something wrong?”


As he spoke, he kept rubbing his body against the youth’s thigh. The shameless actions caused Ming Yu’s breath get out of control and he almost couldn’t hold it.


“Don’t move!” The youth gritted his teeth and snapped out. “I am asking you about a serious matter. Are you hiding something from me…?”


A sudden kiss swallowed up the youth’s next words. With this fierce and passionate kiss, Ming Yu couldn’t breathe for a while. He could only let the man’s tongue fill his mouth, sucking up the body fluids.


The obscene silver strange lingered between the lips of the two people. The kiss was too sudden and Xi Ze’s actions too overbearing and fierce. his rationality was instantly captured and he had to go along with the flow, powerless to respond to this kiss.


Once the kiss was over, Ming Yu was completely dizzy and almost forgot what he was doing.


Then Xi Ze didn’t give him any consideration. He gently kiss the young man’s red lips that were slightly inflamed. A sweet sound couldn’t help escaping from Ming Yu’s throat. Then Xi Ze shifted his position and started to bite the white earlobe.


The tip of his tongue gently poked at the small hole, causing Ming Yu to pant.


In general, Ming Yu rarely wore earrings but he had the ear hole. At this moment, Xi Ze used his rough tongue to constantly lick the sensitive earlobe. Ming Yu was unable to stop him from doing anything.


Once the clothes on his upper body was removed by the man, the cold restored some of Ming Yu’s rationality. By then, the man had rudely swept some of the pens and papers on the table to the ground. Ming Yu saw it and asked, “That is your recent design drawing, isn’t it very precious?”


The man placed his lover on the table and raise an eyebrow, “Do you know what the most powerful part of your husband is?”


Ming Yu smiled. “Husband, you are a ghost.”


“The things that are you in husband’s brain, no one can take it away.”


“You are a shameless rascal. I’m not playing with you. I’m going downstairs to find Brother Zhao and Sister Luo.”


How could Xi Ze give Ming Xiaoyu a chance to escape? He did all this and now had to pursue victory!


As for what he later said to the rogue, Ming Xiaoyu never wanted to recall it.


This didn’t stop Ming Yu from having unstable legs when he left Xi Ze’s office. His whole body was weak, causing him to be held in Xi Ze’s arms as they left the company together.


Fortunately, Xi Ze had an exclusive elevator in the company and they weren’t discovered by anyone as they headed to the garage. Only poor Ding Bo found a locked door when he went to find Xi Ze in one hour. The soundproofed room meant it was impossible for the young man’s voice to leak out. Therefore, Ding Bo thought that Xi Ze had already left.


In the evening, Xi Ze had to deal with many things due to wasting time in the afternoon. After cleaning up the youth’s body, he placed the sleeping youth on the bed.


Xi Ze carefully arranged the quilt and bent to gently kiss Ming Yu’s lips.


Just as he was going to turn away, his clothes were suddenly pulled. Xi Ze turned with surprised, only to see blurred eyes as the youth softly said, “Kiss me then go.”


Xi Ze’s eyes deepened as he bent to give his lover a long kiss. Then he finally turned away.


After leaving, he temporarily didn’t return to Ji and Ya but headed to the Muse building. In the dark of night, a tall and elegant man entered the building with a blank expression and sneaked into his office.


Before leaving, Xi Ze had deliberately locked the door and now he came back to… cough, clean up the scene.


Nonsense! How can someone else see his lover’s mess?


This must be cleaned by himself!


Pity our pampered lives… well, this wasn’t really true. Xi Ze was cook at cooking. In any case, Mr. Xi rarely did manual labour but now he was using a wet towel to carefully wipe at the table, the chair, the floor and so on…


Why was that saying?


Play for a while, clean up like a dog afterwards!


After spending more than half an hour cleaning his office of all the evidence, Xi Ze wiped the sweat on his forehead, three things away in a rubbish bin and then drove to the Ji and Ya studio.


Xi Ze’s exclusive elevator moved from the top floor to the basement level and didn’t stop on any floor.


Xi Ze didn’t know it but in a coffee shop on the 28th floor of the Muse building, a handsome man happened to run into someone else. The latter smiled and the two people sat down in the coffee shop to chat.


At this time, most of the staff members in the Muse building had already left work. It was truly fate to be able to meet here. After all, his position was much higher in the company than Lu Zhenxi but Cheng Su politely asked Lu Zhenxi to drink a cup of coffee with him. The two of them sat at a round table and chattered casually.


At this time, Lu Zhenxi was no longer under Zeng Shu’s hands. He had completely abandoned the fashion industry and decided not to model again. Therefore, Zeng Shu gave Lu Zhenxi to an agent in Muse dedicated to acting, making a clean break.


“In fact, I’ve never blamed Brother Zeng. My new agent must have a worse position in the company but as Brother Zeng said, I no longer have a way to become a model. It was better to go to the entertainment industry and in any case, I quite like acting.”


Cheng Su drank the coffee, looking at Lu Zhenxi and said casually, “Brother Zeng is really too ruthless. So what if you offended Ming Yu a bit? Muse isn’t his company, nor is the fashion industry. Why can’t you have a place in the fashion industry despite having a bad relationship with him?”


Lu Zhenxi shook his head. “I also know that I don’t have talent in modelling. I don’t particularly care about this matter. But Brother Cheng, your words aren’t wrong. Brother Zeng told me it isn’t Ming YU suppressing me. It is…”


Lu Zhenxi paused and thought for a moment. “It is the person behind Ming Yu. Brother Zeng said that Ming Yu’s background is very strong and I can’t fight him. Since the other person doesn’t intend to block me in the entertainment industry, I might as well have a career in acting.”


Cheng Su’s eyes narrowed. “But Lu Zhenxi, you and Ming Yu just had a small disagreement. Isn’t it too much for the person behind Ming Yu to act like that? Are you really not angry? Don’t you feel any resentment?”


Lu Zhenxi smiled wryly. “Brother Cheng, I’m not a newcomer who just entered the industry. The industry has always been unclean. One wrong step and I can no longer come back. Now I am a showbiz person. I am no longer a model.”


Looking at Lu Zhenxi, Cheng Su seemed to want to say something more. But then Lu Zhenxi said, “Brother Cheng, to tell you the truth, I slightly dislike you. I originally offended Ming Yu to please you but now that I think about it, everything is over. I was really wrong. I shouldn’t use other people to climb up if I really value my strength.”


Cheng Su frowned and didn’t speak.


“Now I just want to honestly be an actor. I might not climb to the first-tier with my strength but I want to rely on my own efforts to go as far as possible. Brother Cheng, it is the law of the jungle. If I beat Ming Yu now, I can’t say for sure that I am better. When I think of this, I have accepted the unpleasant facts.


Cheng Su said urgently, “But Lu Zhenxi…”


“Brother Cheng, shut up. I know that you don’t want me to let go of my hatred of Ming Yu. I know you don’t like Ming Yu. I don’t know why but I heard that you and he had some unpleasant relationship before. But I advise you not to have anything to do with him. Don’t you know? A friend of mine Jiang Kaiyang went against Ming Yu and was blocked for five years. This is tantamount to ruining him!”


Cheng Su’s eyes shone and he didn’t say a word.


After chatting for a while, the two of them separated. Cheng Su went downstairs to find his car and a white Toyota disappeared into the night.


However, Lu Zhenxi’s last words always echoed in Cheng Su’s mind.
